data.text: @aguspetit Hi, we sent you a DM. Regards.
@Anderson_road We sent you a DM. Regards.
@Anderson_road Hello, you can send us more information about the issue you had via DM. We will wait for your reply.
@josignacio_ We sent you a DM. Regards.
@marycarmenfr Te sugerimos eliminar esta publicación ya que cuenta con información personal y envíanos la información solicitada por DM (Mensaje directo). Saludos.

@josignacio_ Hi, please send us the next information by DM: LATAM account number, country of residence, date of birth, email address registered into it and the last flight you accredited miles with. We'll be waiting for your message. Regards.
@marycarmenfr Hola, confirmanos vía DM (interno), código de reserva y nombre completo del pasajero. Quedamos atentos. Saludos.
@marycarmenfr Hola, para entregarte mayor información te pedimos nos envíes vía DM la información anteriormente solicitada. Quedamos atentos.

@marycarmenfr Hola, te recomendamos eliminar los mensajes anteriores ya que contienen información personal. Para la ruta que viajas contamos con vuelos directos a partir del 01 de abril. Para solicitar el cambio ingresa aquí: https://t.co/moyoFM7JiD con código de reserva y apellido. Saludos.

@marycarmenfr Hola, envíanos por DM tu código de reserva o número de ticket y nombre y apellido completo del pasajero esto con el fin de validar la información y poder asistirte. Agradecemos tu contacto y quedamos atentos a tu respuesta. Saludos.
@raphipineda Hello, we sent you a DM. Regards.
@marycarmenfr Hola, en ese enlace puedes encontrar más números de teléfono de los contact center en los cuales pueden contestar. Saludos.
@marycarmenfr Hola, los números de atención al cliente 1 866 435 9526 y desde fuera del país1 866 435 9526, en este enlace https://t.co/8OM9usdvPF encontraras más detalles. Saludos.
@marycarmenfr Hola, si podemos ayudarte, puedes contarnos de manera detallada tu solicitud vía DM. Quedamos atentos
@GildaVanderbilt We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@rchdtra Hello, please send us a DM with details about your request. Regards.
@katewatson0207 Hello, you will find the information here: https://t.co/k5fPTJafVT. Regards.
@GildaVanderbilt We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@GildaVanderbilt Hello, send us the booking code and the names of the passengers via DM. We will wait for your reply.
@PepeGaldino Hi, we've sent you a DM. Regards.
@toneee88 Hi, send us your booking code and full name through a DM to check your protecting options. Regards.
@YuriRibeiro99 If you want us to check your booking, send us a DM with your booking code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 numbers), and your full name.
@YuriRibeiro99 Hi, if there's anything we can help you with, let us know. Regards.
@bruninhabrazil We have sent you a response via DM. Regards.
@tonei Hi, send us your booking code or ticket number through a DM to check the information. Regards.

@marciowille Hi, please write us by DM to send you all the details regarding your flight. We suggest deleting or hiding this tweet as it contains personal information( booking code) and valid your surnames by private message as well. Regards.
@ChulaLilia Hi, we've sent you a DM. Please, choose one language: English or Spanish. Regards.
@mastersdrimist If you want to make a claim, please enter here: https://t.co/AEyOz3epCF. Regards.
@mastersdrimist Hi, if you need assistance, please send us a DM with more details. Regards.
@leticia34176097 We have sent you a response via DM. Regards.
@BrianBadieHair Hello, in order to help you, please send us further information about your request via DM. We will await for your reply. Regards.

If you believe money is owed to you by LATAM, you have until December 18th, 2020 to file a claim in the chapter 11 bankruptcy. https://t.co/AOAEPE747s https://t.co/cbl6bU6J66

@DrRicardoBianco Our contact center number in the USA is 1 866 435 9526, you can send us your formal claims using this link: https://t.co/ls2iRXvYSu, we requested certain information to assist you in the refunding process. Regards.
@DrRicardoBianco You can send us the corresponding data through a DM, so we can attach it on your case. Regards.
@DrRicardoBianco It is necessary to send us the information that we requested through your case.
@Evi714 Hello, please send us a DM with more details about your request. Thank you.
@DrRicardoBianco You'll have to send us that information in order to assist you. Furthermore, our Contact Center number is 1 866 435 9526. Regards.
@DrRicardoBianco Hi, as soon as you send us that information through your case, we'll get in contact with you. Regards.
@DayanePaiva19_ Hi, please send us a DM with your booking code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 numbers), and your full name. We'll stay tuned.
@lizgrojas Hello, we have sent you a response via DM. Regards.

@amariecorky Hello, have in mind that blocking the middle seat as a measure of social distancing is not recommended by IATA within its guidelines to ensure a safe flight. On the other side, please send us your booking code or ticket number via DM in order to provide you further assistance.

data.text: @BernsteinNico Hola, te enviamos una respuesta por DM. Saludos.
@BernsteinNico Hola, por favor envianos un DM con detalles de la solicitud. Gracias.
@klaudiaSV84 Hola, indícanos cómo podemos ayudarte por este medio. Por favor envíanos los detalles por vía mensaje privado. Quedamos atentos. Saludos.
@giacomo77777 Hi, send us the details about your request through a DM to assist you. Regards.
@p3t3ral3x Hello, please send us a DM with more details. Regards.
@GeiseZa Hi, we are working on your case and we will send you an email with an answer. Regards.

@carlosarias10 Hi, we suggest contacting the official health entity belonging to the destination to ask for more details regarding it. We also recommend deleting or hiding your publication as it contains personal information. Regards.
@asevszny Hello, in order to provide you further information please send us via DM your booking code or ticket number and your full name. We will await for your reply. Regards.
@Rakeshb43 We sent you a DM. Thanks.
@KarinTaps Hi, we'll send more information about your cases through email. Regards.

@carlosarias10 Yes, you need to present all the documentation requested by the corresponding government entity. Have in mind that it will be verified by the airport authorities at the airport. Regards.
@Rakeshb43 We sent an email. Please, reply it. Thanks.
@Rakeshb43 We sent you a DM.
@Rakeshb43 Hi, send us a DM with your claim number so we can look into it. Thanks.
@carlosarias10 Hi, we suggest bringing it printed. Regards.
@bruninhabrazil We have sent you a response via DM. Regards.

@KarinTaps Hello, we understand your position and have the certainty that we are working on both of your cases in order to provide you a formal response as soon as possible. Please, wait for our contact. Regards.
@bruninhabrazil Hi, we have sent a response through DM. Regards.
@iheartmrvans Hi, please send us a DM with his full name and booking code. Regards.

Many people have told us that connecting with themselves or reliving experiences in nature makes them fly. We are delighted to know that there are so many reasons to travel and meet on board. Tell us, #WhatMakesYouFly? https://t.co/XISLKeJNng https://t.co/vPdDeEX7cA

data.text: @runkat916 Hola, coméntanos detalles de lo sucedido y si cuentas con un número de caso, envíanoslo vía DM. Quedamos atentos.

@carlosarias10 Hi, the negative Molecular Test (RT-PCR, NAAT, LAMP) certificate or an antigen test for COVID-19 has to be issued no more than 72 hours before their scheduled flight. Regards.
@bruninhabrazil Hello, we have requested you some information in order to help you. Regards.
